name: Dice Tower Defense
description: Don't let the enemy destroy your kingdom! You must defend your positions in a merciless battle against an endless stream of invaders. Think carefully about your defense and survive as long as possible!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: or better Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: any
